Class MovieService

java.lang.Object
com.yash.MovieBooking.service.MovieService
@Service public class MovieService extends Object
Service class for managing movie-related operations.

    • createMovie

      public Movie createMovie(Movie movie)
      Creates a new movie.
      Parameters:
      movie - The Movie object to create.
      Returns:
      The created Movie object.

    • getMovieById

      public Movie getMovieById(int mid)
      Retrieves a movie by its ID.
      Parameters:
      mid - The ID of the movie to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Movie object matching the given ID, or null if not found.

    • getMovieBygenre

      public List<Movie> getMovieBygenre(String genre)
      Retrieves a list of movies belonging to a specific genre.
      Parameters:
      genre - The genre of the movies to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Movie objects matching the given genre.

    • shoeMovies

      public List<Movie> shoeMovies()
      Retrieves a list of all movies.
      Returns:
      A list of all Movie objects.

    • deleteMovie

      @Transactional public void deleteMovie(int mid)
      Deletes a movie by its ID. Also deletes any associated showtimes and seats to maintain data integrity.
      Parameters:
      mid - The ID of the movie to delete.

    • updateMovie

      public Movie updateMovie(Movie movie)
      Updates an existing movie.
      Parameters:
      movie - The Movie object to update.
      Returns:
      The updated Movie object.
